name: Talk to Me (POLIMI Game Collective)
description:
Talk to me is a 2D adventure game with alternation of platforming  and puzzles.

Ablo is a boy who lives in the quiet town of Soliloquia. One day he wakes up with an epiphany:

the people of his hometown always speak for themselves, and they speak so much that he can't say anything!

When people talk, you can interact with their speech balloons.

CONTROLS:

  • move with WASD
  • jump with SPACE
  • talk with E
  • open menu with ESC

KNOWN ISSUES:

  • some dialogues may repeat or remain blank when triggered. Please just insist talking until they fix :)
  • game may be clipped if played in window mode. Please play it full-screen if possible
